channel.title: Help Adding A Command To Tele To Pest Control?
channel.description: So a source I downloaded has Pest Control, I saw the file called pestcontrol.java, I just need to somehow add a command in commands.java so people can type ::pestcontrol and get teled there and play, someone please help?

item.title: Help Adding A Command To Tele To Pest Control?
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

Why add a command, just add a teleport in minigames teleport, more rs like…

Read full topic
item.source: Help Adding A Command To Tele To Pest Control?

item.title: Help Adding A Command To Tele To Pest Control?
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“pestcontrol”)) {
c.getPA().movePlayer(XXXX, YYYY, H);
c.sendMessage("@blu@Welcome To @red@PestControl!)");
}

Read full topic
item.source: Help Adding A Command To Tele To Pest Control?

item.title: Help Adding A Command To Tele To Pest Control?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

You can do it several ways,

		[code=java]             if(playerCommand.equals("pc")) 
		{
	    c.teleportToX = X_AXIS;
                c.teleportToY = Y_AXIS;
		}[/code]
		
		or
		
		[code=java]             if(playerCommand.equals("pc")) 
		{
		c.getPA().movePlayer(X_AXIS, Y_AXIS, HEIGHT);
		}[/code]

		[code=java]             if(playerCommand.equals("pc")) 
		{
		c.getPA().movePlayer(X_AXIS, Y_AXIS, HEIGHT, "modern"); // or ancient
		}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Help Adding A Command To Tele To Pest Control?
